topic.title: DTO and their types
topic.shortdesc: This section may be useful for front-end developers, business and technical analytics, pre-sales, sales and even marketing to some point. Data Transfer Object (DTO) usually use to simplify calling data and function that are needed to handle specific task and run needed functions.

body.p: We consider for DTO some container for all data and functions that are needed to handle specific function as a step of a bigger business task. Business task in this context means any task that may be done by using Digital Banking solution. DTO comprise data and functions from any data sources and provide all needed information to operate with those data and functions that are the parts of this specific DTO. One DTO may be connected to more than one function or task at the same time. Many DTO may be connected to one task as far as task may comprise several functions (steps).
